title: Marathon Completion
text: Ran my first marathon in 4:15 after six months of training, with a 10k tune-up race to practice running race-pace. Missed two weeks with shin splints but kept going. Finishing strong was the win.

title: Half-Marathon Personal Record
text: Trained consistently for a half-marathon and a local 10k running race, set a PR, and learned how to hold race-pace through the middle miles to finish strong.

title: Public Speaking Breakthrough
text: Used to freeze during presentations. After a year with Toastmasters, gave a meetup talk to ~200 people. Slides crashed mid-talk, so I improvised confidently and kept the audience with me.

title: Toastmasters Contest Speech
text: Gave a meetup talk for Toastmasters; when the slides crashed, I improvised confidently, spoke without notes, and kept the audience engaged with a quick story and Q&A.

title: Cooking a New Dish
text: Tried cooking homemade pasta for the first time. Dough stuck everywhere, but with practice the dish came out delicious. Fun kitchen win I want to repeat.

title: Learning Guitar
text: Picked up guitar and practiced daily drills. Fingers hurt at first, but I learned my first song end-to-end and can now play it smoothly. Small, fun music milestone.

title: Deadline Risk: MVP Scope Cut and Delivery
text: Faced a slipping deadline with reduced capacity. I aligned stakeholders, cut scope to a true MVP, focused on must-haves, and delivered on timeâ€”finished strong with a stable build.

title: Feature Freeze and Scope Alignment
text: Negotiated a feature freeze two weeks before launch, trimmed nice-to-haves, and aligned everyone on MVP. The release landed smoothly and on time.
